extendedInfo.description: Starting with 430 official DSA Theory Test questions, Driving Test Examstutor is a new Driving Test preparation app. Instant feedback for each question helps you identifying the correct response to any questions you get wrong. Reinforcing your understanding of all the key topics in the official Driving Standards Agency Driving Theory Test.Revision Pathways, map the key topics in your Driving Theory Test. Revise a specific Topic, or create Random Tests, with questions drawn from a specific topic, or from across the entire question bank.Features include:Â· Topics Test: covering all officially examined topicsÂ· Random Tests: Choose the number of questions randomly drawn from either the entire question bank or the topic you are currently revising.Â· Instant Feedback : Correct Answers identified if you get a question wrong, reinforcing learning.Â· Report Card : tracking your performance in all the tests you take, whilst charting your understanding of each topic prior to you sitting your Official Driving Theory Test.Topics covered:Â· AccidentsÂ· AlertnessÂ· AttitudeÂ· DocumentsÂ· Hazard AwarenessÂ· Light signals controlling trafficÂ· Motorway RulesÂ· MotorwaysÂ· Other Types of VehicleÂ· Road and Traffic SignsÂ· Rule of the RoadÂ· Safety and your VehicleÂ· Safety MarginsÂ· Traffic SignsÂ· Vehicle HandlingÂ· Vulnerable Road UseCopyright (c) Examstutor Limited 2011Crown Copyright material has been reproduced by permission of the Driving Standards Agency which does not accept any responsibility for the accuracy of the reproduction. Content is valid for theory tests after September 2008.
